H0.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Lactose

H1.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Casein

H2.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Lectin

H3.text: What is someone allergic to if they have coeliac disease. Glutin

A4.text: People with celiac disease must avoid traces of gluten even if they do not experience overt acute symptoms from cross-contact.

A5.text: Celiac disease (CD) is a chronic, multiple-organ autoimmune disorder primarily affecting the small intestine caused by the ingestion of wheat, barley, rye, oats, and derivatives, that appears in genetically predisposed people of all ages.
